Dear Mr. Assad:
Thank you very much for your letter of October 9. lam enclosing a television
Fact Sheet Index and believe you will find it helpful in obtaining material con-
ceming the topic you mentioned in your letter.
Our Fact Sheets are available at ten cents per copy, or we can give you a comÂ¬
plete set for $7.50 $2.50 per year, the complete set covers 1955, 1956 and
1S57). As of January, 1958, the NAEB Fact Sheets will be incorporated into
the NAEB Journal and will be availabe via subscription at $4.00 per year.
If you desire any Fact Sheets now, please let us know. Be sure to include
the Series number AND Item number.
Sincerely,
Enclosures: Index
(5) Fact Sheet Samples
(Mrs.)Judith B. Gans
